text: :wave: Hello to everybody, I’m new to HubSpot and I am looking for access to “HubSpot lead flows” from my account, but I haven’t been lucky with my little research so far. Anybody happen to know where it is ? Many thanks in advance :blush: :pray:
I'm not familiar with the lead flows term. Are you talking about workflows perhaps? Automation logic for contact properties, emails, etc?

Thanks Evan, for your reaction.

What I am really looking for is a piece of code mentioning `<http://js.hsleadflows.net|js.hsleadflows.net>` .

According to Google we are not even using this tool and I need to remove it, except I don’t know where it is used/mentioned/configured :see_no_evil: We are using a HubSpot powered website with quite a history and our whole team is at sea about where the javascripts are on HubSpot :smiling_face_with_tear:

I assume you've searched/grepped your codebase. If so here are two other ideas. Hopefully this gets you on the right track:

Have you checked header and footer include scripts in the account settings?
<https://app.HubSpot.com/settings/YOURNUMBERHERE~7DIGITS/website/pages/all-domains/page-templates>

If it's there, I *THINK* it'd get plugged in probablya t the template level by standard_header_includes or something

Here's what I have as an example
otherwise, it might get included by google tag manager or similar
Apparently it's a tracking "pixel"... very easy to accumulate many of those and forget to remove them!!! Good luck!
No I haven’t ! Thank you Evan ! Still no sign of leadsflow but I found another similar tool that I’m supposed to remove !
Great, keep at it. Man it can be tough to find all the nooks and crannies in an old website! I wish you the best
Change the name of the module
Yes, I see what I was doing wrong, thanks.
Hi everyone! I'm Ashraf & new to this HubSpot community.
